name: Spot The Differences - Fun Puzzle Picture Game
name_original: Spot The Differences - Fun Puzzle Picture Game
description:
Spot The Differences - Fun Puzzle Picture Game is a classic spot-the-difference, addictive type of game with great puzzles to solve, colourful cartoon pictures, fun and challenging.

All scenes are full of fun with plenty of variety. In some cases you are in safari with African animals, next time you're underwater. You will be even teleported into the future where your task is to spot hidden differences in robots! Not to mention creatures out of this world :) How cool is that? Expect unexpected! Play fun seek and find!


Features:
- 25 fun, yet challenging levels with 10 differences in each
- Really entertaining and educational game
- Addictive gameplay
- Game teaches attentiveness
- Catchy sound effects and music!
- Brain and memory training (visual comparison) while you play having fun
- Great game for kids playing with adults. Also great for adults themselves!
- Hints system if you get stuck
- Completely FREE!
- Intended for kids, but also fun for grown-ups
- Competition with time. Every wrong answer reduces time
- Improve difference-finding abilities
- Super enjoyable puzzles to solve

How to Play:
- Look at the two pictures and find the differences
- Tap the differences to mark them
- Watch out the timer. Remember wrong answers take your time remaining. Don't guess.

When you enjoyed playing Spot The Differences - Fun Puzzle Picture Game, you should definitely check also our other games.
